name: sokamoka
description:
I couldnt finish this game, and there's a lot of ideas i wanted to implement but sadly couldnt as i lacked the time and opportunity to do so, i still really hope you all enjoy the little this game has to offer :)

Source code: here ya go son

Tools: Löve, LDTK, Bitwig Studio, Audacity, My dad's guitar, Fedora (i guess...?), AppImageToolkit, Ritalin, lite-xl and a liiittle bit of VSCode.

Credits: (check this) Music and sprites done by me, certain sound effects were recorded and published freely. Most code written by me, with the exception of some nice libre libraries and Löve, of course!

Controls: WASD
